members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.SpeechSynthesisUtterance()
members.description: Returns a new SpeechSynthesisUtterance object instance.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the text that will be synthesised when the utterance is spoken..

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.lang
members.description: Gets and sets the language of the utterance.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.pitch
members.description: Gets and sets the pitch at which the utterance will be spoken at.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.rate
members.description: Gets and sets the speed at which the utterance will be spoken at.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text
members.description: Gets and sets the text that will be synthesised when the utterance is spoken.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.voice
members.description: Gets and sets the voice that will be used to speak the utterance.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.volume
members.description: Gets and sets the volume that the utterance will be spoken at.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.onboundary
members.description: Fired when the spoken utterance reaches a word or sentence boundary.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.onend
members.description: Fired when the utterance has finished being spoken.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.onerror
members.description: Fired when an error occurs that prevents the utterance from being succesfully spoken.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.onmark
members.description: Fired when the spoken utterance reaches a named SSML "mark" tag.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.onpause
members.description: Fired when the utterance is paused part way through.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.onresume
members.description: Fired when a paused utterance is resumed.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.onstart
members.description: Fired when the utterance has begun to be spoken.
